name: SkittlesAlarm
0:
”Alexa, wake me up at 7:00 AM to skittles alarm tone”
”Alexa, set an alarm at 7:00 AM to skittles alarm tone”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: skittles alarm
des:
With the Skittles® Alarm Tones, some of the scariest characters you’ve never met are standing by to startle you, your friends and family any time of day. Everyone from a hungry zombie to a voracious vampire to a carnivorous clown is here to remind you just how sour Skittles Shriekers can be.
 
This alarm pack includes five custom alarms that will have you and the ones you love shrieking any time of day. Plus three spine-tingling snooze tones thrown in for evil measure. Whether you want to wake yourself up in a cold sweat or scare your friends and family silly any time of day, just say, “Alexa, set the Skittles Alarm tone for (insert time of your choice here!).” And while you're at it, video someone getting startled by the Skittles Alarm and share it on social media, #daretherainbow.
 
You can get Skittles Shriekers in Shocking Lime, Spine-Tingling Tangerine, Citrus Scream, Rattled Raspberry and Ghoulish Green Apple flavors.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
